with ZMMT_TMP AS ( SELECT t1.EBELN, t1.EBELP, sum(t1.MENGE) as menge_tot FROM WINGSAPP.WJQ.wjq.ZMMT2006 as t1 LEFT JOIN WINGSAPP.WJQ.wjq.ZMMT2004 as t2 on t1.EBELN = t2.EBELN and t1.EBELP = t2.EBELP WHERE t1.DEL <>'X' AND t2.lifnr = #{company_cd} GROUP BY t1.EBELN,t1.EBELP )
SELECT t1.MANDT, t1.lifnr, t1.SUPP_F_IN_UNAME as UNAME, t1.lifnr as FIN_ID, (case when t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112) then t2.DELVN else '' end ) as DELVN, (case when t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112) then t2.DELVS else '' end ) as DELVS, t1.EBELN, t1.EBELP, t1.MATNR, t1.TXZ01, t1.MENGE as ebeln_menge, (case when t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112) then t2.MENGE else null end ) as MENGE, t1.MEINS, t1.EINDT, t1.MENGE, (case when t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) then t2.NAP_PRE_DT else null end ) as NAP_PRE_DT, isnull(t3.menge_tot,0) as menge_tot , (isnull(t1.MENGE,0)-isnull(t3.menge_tot,0)) as ibgo_menge FROM WINGSAPP.WJQ.wjq.ZMMT2004 as t1 LEFT JOIN WINGSAPP.WJQ.wjq.ZMMT2006 as t2 on t2.DEL <> 'X' AND t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112) AND t1.EBELN = t2.EBELN AND t1.EBELP = t2.EBELP LEFT JOIN ZMMT_TMP as t3 ON t1.EBELN = t3.EBELN and t1.EBELP = t3.EBELP WHERE t1.lifnr = #{company_cd} --AND t1.EINDT >= '20210101'
AND (t1.EBELN like concat('%',#{schword},'%'))
AND t1.statu in ('3','4','5','6') AND (case when t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112) then t2.DELVS else '' end ) in ('','A') AND ((isnull(t1.MENGE,0)-isnull(t3.menge_tot,0)) > 0 or (case when t2.NAP_PRE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112) then t2.DELVS else '' end ) = 'A')

) values ( #{DeliveryDoc_MANDT}, Replace(Convert(varchar(8),Getdate(),108),':',''), 'A', #{DeliveryDoc_EBELN}, #{DeliveryDoc_EBELP}, #{DeliveryDoc_MATNR}, #{DeliveryDoc_TXZ01}, #{DeliveryDoc_LIFNR}, replace(#{DeliveryDoc_ibgo_menge},',',''), #{DeliveryDoc_MEINS}, replace(#{DeliveryDoc_NAP_PRE_DT},'.',''), /* 납품예정일*/ '000000', /* 납품예정시간 */ CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(), 112), /* 납품문서번호생성일*/ Replace(Convert(varchar(8),Getdate(),108),':',''), /* 납품문서번호생성시간*/ '', /* 삭제지시자*/ '', /* 삭제일자 */ '', /* 삭제시간*/ #{DeliveryDoc_UNAME}, /* 생성인*/ #{DeliveryDoc_FIN_ID}, /* 생성인ID*/ '', '', '', '' ) SET XACT_ABORT OFF
